Additional note: when the issue is hit, `gem uninstall progressbar` and remove older versions.
switching base branch to one Dag S can commit into.  PR Back soon..

Merging this based on separate systemvmtemplate builder job result.

Re: XenServer test results:
The VPC related test failures for Xenserver are known intermittent failures and ignore-able.
The `test_nic` failed due to ` errortext : u'Unable to start a VM due to insufficient capacity'}` and is ignorable env issue.
The `test_network` failed due to `Resource [Host:2] is unreachable: Host 2: Unable to start instance due to Unable to start  VM:7565a8fc-2131-4984-add7-3f288d05ee27 due to error in finalizeStart, not retrying'`. 

With this, I don't see any blocker issue. I'll proceed with merging these backported changes and work towards fixing any issues/tests, and with option to revert any of the changes. The branch will be fwd-merged using `-X ours` strategy so there will be no changes/issues in 4.10/master branches.

I've re-implemented the fix with a bounded queue/thread size (limit to 50 threads max). On my local machine I was able to deploy a zone with 1000 hosts across 50 clusters and it took less than 3 minutes which previously took close to one hour.

There is no change other than marvin itself, a Travis test run would validate the change. I've also added a sample 1k zone deployment cfg.
